name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D新衣装お披露目】宝鐘マリン生誕3D LIVE ！！重大告知あり！ゲスト多数＆サクラ大戦から豪華ゲストも！！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】#宝鐘マリ [1WbyakjUmsI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Shoujo Rei' by Houshou Marine and Shiranui Flare.
MC section where Shirogane Noel introduces a new segment called 'BocaColle'.
Performance of the song 'Mimukawa Nice Try' by Houshou Marine and Shirogane Noel while playing UNO.

subtitles.original: 飛び出した
subtitles.english: Jumped out

subtitles.original: そう 君は友達 僕の手を掴めよ
subtitles.english: That's right, you're a friend, grab my hand

subtitles.original: そう 君は独りさ 居場所なんてないだろ
subtitles.english: That's right, you're alone, there's no place for you, is there?

subtitles.original: 二人きりこのまま 愛し合えるさ
subtitles.english: Just the two of us, we can love each other like this

subtitles.original: 繰り返す フラッシュバック 蝉の声 二度と帰らぬ君
subtitles.english: Repeating flashback, cicada voices, you who will never return

subtitles.original: 永遠に千切れてく お揃いのキーホルダー
subtitles.english: Forever tearing apart, our matching keychains

subtitles.original: 夏が消し去った 白い肌の少女に
subtitles.english: To the girl with white skin that summer erased

subtitles.original: 哀しいほど 取り憑かれてしまいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be possessed by you to a sad extent

subtitles.original: 反射が暴れ始める 九月のスタート告げるチャイム
subtitles.english: Reflections begin to run wild, the chime announcing the start of September

subtitles.original: 次の標的に置かれた風 仕掛けたのは僕だった
subtitles.english: The wind placed on the next target, I was the one who set it up

subtitles.original: そう 君が悪いんだよ 僕だけを見ててよ
subtitles.english: That's right, it's your fault, look only at me

subtitles.original: そう 君の苦しみ 助けが欲しいだろ
subtitles.english: That's right, your suffering, you want help, don't you?

subtitles.original: 溺れてくその手に そっとキスをした
subtitles.english: I gently kissed that drowning hand

subtitles.original: 薄笑いの獣たち その心晴れるまで
subtitles.english: The faintly smiling beasts, until that heart clears

subtitles.original: 爪を突き立てる 不揃いのスカート
subtitles.english: Digging in claws, the uneven skirts

subtitles.original: 夏の静寂を切り裂くような悲鳴が
subtitles.english: A scream like it's tearing through the summer silence

subtitles.original: 木霊する 教室の窓には青空
subtitles.english: Echoing, there's a blue sky in the classroom window

subtitles.original: 君は友達
subtitles.english: You are a friend

subtitles.original: そう 君は友達 僕の手を掴めよ
subtitles.english: That's right, you're a friend, grab my hand

subtitles.original: そう 君がいなくちゃ 居場所なんてないんだよ
subtitles.english: That's right, without you, there's no place for me

subtitles.original: 透き通った世界で 愛し合えたら
subtitles.english: If we could love each other in a transparent world

subtitles.original: 繰り返す フラッシュバック 蝉の声 二度と帰らぬ君
subtitles.english: Repeating flashback, cicada voices, you who will never return

subtitles.original: 永遠に千切れてく お揃いのキーホルダー
subtitles.english: Forever tearing apart, our matching keychains

subtitles.original: 夏が消し去った 白い肌の少女に
subtitles.english: To the girl with white skin that summer erased

subtitles.original: 哀しいほど 取り憑かれてしまいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be possessed by you to a sad extent

subtitles.original: 透明な君は 僕を指差してた
subtitles.english: You, transparent, were pointing at me

subtitles.original: 遂に始まりました！！ボカコレです！！
subtitles.english: It's finally started!! It's BocaColle!!

subtitles.original: UNO♡
subtitles.english: UNO!

subtitles.original: おや、手札多過ぎクッソワロタｗ
subtitles.english: Oh? Your hand is way too big, LOL

subtitles.original: 次のターンで私が勝ちまちゅね♡
subtitles.english: I'm gonna win on the next turn♡

subtitles.original: そのザコさの秘訣を教えてちょ。う・じ・む・し・ちゃん♡
subtitles.english: Tell me the secret to that weakness. Lit-tle mag-got-chan♡

subtitles.original: ねぇカッコわるく負けちゃだーめっ。
subtitles.english: Hey, you mustn't lose so pathetically.

subtitles.original: ほら がんばれっ♡がんばれっ♡
subtitles.english: Come on, do your best♡ do your best♡

subtitles.original: ホンキ出したら勝てるんでしょ早く見せて？一煽り。
subtitles.english: If you get serious, you can win, right? Hurry up and show me? One taunt.

subtitles.original: 屈辱辱辱辱ミス辱
subtitles.english: Humiliation-tion-tion-tion miss-tion

subtitles.original: 此奴は言わずと知れた
subtitles.english: This fellow is as you well know

subtitles.original: いくじなし♡
subtitles.english: A coward♡

subtitles.original: ぴえん越えてだったぁ♡
subtitles.english: Beyond Pien, it was Tassa♡

subtitles.original: ぱおん越えてざっまぁ♡
subtitles.english: Beyond Paon, serves you right!♡
